recipe.ingredients: - chickpeas: 1 can (15 ounces) - olive oil: 1 tablespoon - smoked paprika: 1 teaspoon - garlic powder: 1/2 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Chickpeas: Drain and rinse the chickpeas. Pat them dry with a towel to remove excess moisture. 2. Season: In a bowl, mix the chickpeas with olive oil, smoked paprika, garlic powder, and black pepper. 3. Bake: Spread the seasoned chickpeas on a baking sheet in a single layer. Bake at 400Â°F for about 25-30 minutes, or until crispy. 4. Cool and Serve: Let the chickpeas cool before serving to enhance their crunchiness.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 35g, Dietary Fiber: 10g, Sodium: 15mg, Saturated Fat: 1g, Total Fat: 8g, Protein: 10g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 6g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 290 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chickpeas: 210 calories per can Olive Oil: 119 calories per tablespoon Smoked Paprika: Negligible Garlic Powder: Negligible Black Pepper: Negligible - Serving People: 2
